title: Desert, Steel, and an Old Man - Novel Updates
tags: Artificial Intelligence   Biochip   Male Protagonist   Post-apocalyptic
author: Goemon   ゴエモン
description:
Suddenly the earth split apart like jigsaw puzzle pieces, and then connects together without a trace of its original shape.

One day a man woke up in the desert, while still having no clue about what’s going on, he began to wander alone.

An enormous ship that runs on sand, Sandsteam.

A market where firearms are sold as if they were grilled chicken.

A Cyberbrain that I got my hands on in an unexpected turn of events.

Mankind has to survive in a world where Machine-beast (Mutant) roams the earth, a creature mixed between organisms and machines.

Where would the man go to in this devastated world?

That said, this is not a heavy-themed story, the man started to have fun while familiarizing himself with this near-future world.

Still, he has to earn a living somehow, so for now he became a hunter and helped people from time to time.

He’s not popular with girls, always getting dumped.

Travels through the desert armed with Gyrocanopy together with his Cyberbrain navigator buddy, A sci-fi adventure romance action filled with lots of old men!>
